publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1757 Mr Brian Monteith: Hosting Football's 2005 World Club Championship—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Football Association (SFA) on holding exploratory talks with FIFA’s President Sepp Blatter on a possible bid to host the 2005 World Club Championship; urges the SFA to follow this up with a formal bid to host the tournament as well as the 2008 European Nations Championship, and believes that hosting these tournaments would be of great benefit to domestic football, to tourism, to other sectors of the economy and to Scotland’s international reputation.
